cells.data: -- readFile :: FilePath -> IO Stringon readFile(strPath)	set ca to current application	set e to reference	set {s, e} to (ca's NSString's ¬		stringWithContentsOfFile:((ca's NSString's ¬			stringWithString:strPath)'s ¬			stringByStandardizingPath) ¬			encoding:(ca's NSUTF8StringEncoding) |error|:(e))	if e is missing value then		s as string	else		(localizedDescription of e) as string	end ifend readFile
